column3: My wife and I have come here often for show openings and readings. There are also a number of unique items in their gift shop for purchase. Perfect for a birthday or holiday gift. There is free parking behind the gallery as well as free street parking. Check their website for hours or give them a call. Support your local artists by visiting the gallery.

I. Have been to this gallery on numerous occasions, Although it is quite small it us very intimate and well maintained... They have many receptions during the course of the year and very reasonable ADR funds in jewelry and stationary.. Enjoy it!!!

column3: If you are looking for something a little unique as a gift. They have some many one of a kind artist made items. Really high quality and beautiful.
A fantastic small art gallery that serves the community and artists with a variety of art. There is always an interesting show with friendly people.

column2: ART in ALL the RIGHT PLACES
column3: For a real feel of Whittier you must make a stop at this gallery. You will be surprised at the talented local artist's work on display.

The Whittier Gallery is a vibrant place with classes, shows, both juried and open, whose members include painters, photographers, sculptures, potters, graphic artists, fabric artists, and more. It has a long history in Whittier and is well known in the region. It also boasts a very nice gallery with local artists' work for sale. it is a fun place to look around and attending show openings is a great way to get the "feel" of the energy here.
